guides.name: Aragorn II Elessar
guides.bio: Aragorn II, son of Arathorn II and Gilraen, also known as Elessar and Strider, is an expert river navigator. He's also a skilled paramedic.

guides.name: Frodo Baggins
guides.bio: When Frodo was only 12 years old, his parents drowned in a boating accident on the Brandywine River. This early tragedy led Frodo to want to not only understand water safety, but help ensure otehrs can safely enjoy our rivers.

guides.name: Gandalf
guides.bio: Whether you wish you find yourself in the library or on the river, you could not ask for a better companion and friend than Gandalf.

guides.name: Legolas
guides.bio: When not on the river, Legolas can be found at the range practicing his archery. His keen eyes and patient practice have made him a skilled archer.

guides.name: Gimli
guides.bio: Gimli is first and foremost a woodsman, who's skilled with an axe. He's always up for an adventure, whether it's down the river or a bit of spelunking.

guides.name: Samwise Gamgee
guides.bio: Sam Gamgee is our resident nature specialist. We've yet to find a plant that he can't identify. He's an excellent river guide that loves taking nature walks as well.

guides.name: Boromir
guides.bio: Boromir is a valiant and steadfast guide and survivalist. He specializes in overnight excursions.

guides.name: Meriadoc Brandybuck
guides.bio: Merry is our resident creature expert. With a perceptive eye, he can spot even the most illusive animals along the river ways.

guides.name: Peregrin Took
guides.bio: Pippin is our resident forager. He's a wonderful chef with a special fondess for wild mushroom found along the waterways.
